subject: Implementing JUnit AFTER development has started...
msgSnippet: Does anyone have any opinions, suggestions or approaches as to how to best implement JUnit AFTER development has started?  We have a significant code base
messageBody:
Does anyone have any opinions, suggestions or approaches as to how to best implement JUnit AFTER development has started?  We have a significant code base already and we're trying to move to JUnit.  What issues did you have when trying this yourself?  Was your testing hierarchy exactly the same as your application package structure?  Did you start only using JUnit with new development or with bugs as well?  Or did you take a month off and have everyone write JUnit tests?  Any help would be greatly appreciated.
 
 
-dmg
